title: Business Manager, App Store
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just create products — they build the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries...
description: The Business Manager is responsible for guiding App Developers in their business growth and success in the App Store ecosystem by providing the latest tools, policy updates, and new feature information...
key_qualifications:
-  The Business Manager is responsible for guiding App Developers in their business growth and success in the App Store ecosystem by providing the latest tools, policy updates, and new feature information.
-  Working across multi-functional teams, both locally and internationally, you will need to achieve the goal as a team.
-  The primary Key Performance Indicator (KPI) for this role is business growth in terms of billings and defining the business opportunities in the market and leading the App Developers in that direction together.
